Inesa Balic Klicic Art

Drawing artist and painter from Bihac, Bosnia and Herzegovina.

ABOUT
Story
about me

Inesa Balic
Klicic Art

My name is Inesa Balic-Klicic, I am a drawing artist from Bihac, Bosnia and Herzegovina. If you want to find more about me you can visit my story section of the website.

Story

My Gallery

Drawings are made in black and white, with graphite pencils and charcoal, while the paintings are done with vibrant colors, capturing landscapes and nature with lots of light. Full gallery can be viewed by visiting gallery section.
